title: Stuck on Champion Selection
body:
It says "Game starting soon" at champ select, everyones already locked, but it's stuck there, and when you force close league and log in again, it comes up with the orange button saying reconnect, except you cant (button mashing reconnect button here); there's not actually a game in progress... what's more is that when people try to quit the champion selection, they cant, they rejoin automatically...

well... anyone know how to fix this?
